TopicTitle: THE O SO GRAND 0.23 RELEASE DATE!.... thread thing

Articles.Content: The 17th of this month!!!!!! Gooooo ggggooooo spread the news now!!!!!

And now we get the wonderful moments of 100s of thread DUDE IT'S ANNOUNCED! And when it gets close, WHEN IS IT OUT! COUNTDOWN TO MIDNIGHT! WHEN IS IT OUT WHEN WHEN I DEMAND TO KNOW!

...Sigh. 0.22, now 0.23....

*cough* *cough* ----->>>> http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/61356-Kerbal-Space-Program-Update-0-23-Launches-Tuesday-December-17

The more you know....

GI JOE!!
Then will com the thousands that ask why hasn't the update been released yet upon the clock striking twelve in every timezone.
OMGOMGOMG! THE WORLD IS ENDING .23 IS COMING!!12111 1!!!!1!!1!!1!z111

Because I can see the future due to angering the kraken so much, it ripped open a space-time hole, sending Jeb and Bob well beyond the solar system from the explosion.

I can predict the following will happen: 17th will come, and at 00.01AM in every timezone, cries will be heard throughout the forums. When the release is actually released, cries of slow-ass downloads will be heard from non-steamers. Soon after, a few complaints about these 'obvious bugs that should be noticed in testing', for which a small patch will be released days afterwards, then the congratulatory, thank you threads. Finally the threads stating there are too many 0.23 threads.
So... Does anyone know the time that updates are released?

Because I can see the future due to angering the kraken so much, it ripped open a space-time hole, sending Jeb and Bob well beyond the solar system from the explosion.

I can predict the following will happen: 17th will come, and at 00.01AM in every timezone, cries will be heard throughout the forums. When the release is actually released, cries of slow-ass downloads will be heard from non-steamers. Soon after, a few complaints about these 'obvious bugs that should be noticed in testing', for which a small patch will be released days afterwards, then the congratulatory, thank you threads. Finally the threads stating there are too many 0.23 threads.

I've got a good feeling that this release will be different........no, seriously......definitely
Well, I guess I can continue on with 0.22 instead of hoping for a KerbalKon release like last year.
Now my Duna sample return mission must go ahead before the 17th

I've got a good feeling that this release will be different........no, seriously......definitely

I have seen the future, and so it shall be.

This is all well and good for .23 but what I want to know is what is holding up the release of .24 ! ? Are the Devs slacking ? Are they on Christmas holiday? .23 is finally getting released but we have heard absolutely nothing about .24 and I for one demand the truth!

ya I have to start the helix stallion over again to ( my interplanetary ship meant to go to every planet and drop a hab and two rovers) I just got the last module up there before the engines and habs......

what sucks is the the most about this is the complex maneuvering needed to dock 10 that's right 10 docking ports all together at once, 5 on one mod 5 on the other. ooo well...

This is all well and good for .23 but what I want to know is what is holding up the release of .24 ! ? Are the Devs slacking ? Are they on Christmas holiday? .23 is finally getting released but we have heard absolutely nothing about .24 and I for one demand the truth!

Forget 0.24, where's the realistic clouds and destructible terrain, and terraforming?

Where are the planetary rings that render every small rock?

Where is KSP-Mobile?

a fanbase primaritly made of 10 year olds?

Trolls? I dont want to alarm anybody, but we're severely lacking in forum trolls here. I mean we can probably count all of them on one hand. Am I the only one worried by this?

Will the new update increase troll traffic?
ok back on topic guys... back to the awesomeness that is .23 and the future .24
Yo 0.23, I... I'm really happy for you and Imma let you download, but 0.22 was one of the best updates of all time! ONE OF THE BEST UPDATES OF ALL TIME!

So... Does anyone know the time that updates are released?

It will be released exactly at 00:01 CST, 18 December.

(Just keep telling yourself that. Then you won't be worried and disappointed. In fact, you'll be surprised when it's released earlier than that.)

What? That's when the walking dead game season two is released...

Crap, what am i going to do now?

Personally, I just hope that I can land on a body, do my experiments, and shove all that data into the module for return. I'm sick of having to bring back (and figure out how to land) clusters of those materials bays...
